about.title: My story
about.home_summary:

My working life began in the beauty industry as a hairdresser before I moved into finance and insurance. In 2021, everything changed when I was diagnosed with breast cancer. If you’d like to read more about how Pure Glow Wellness began, you can find my full story below.
about.full_bio:
Hello, I’m Caroline. I’m 51, married to my Aussie husband Mic, a proud mum of three gorgeous children, and dog mum to two lovely dogs. I’ve been a Marpler since the age of seven (with a few wonderful years living in Australia along the way), and today I’m living out a dream I never expected: running my own skin and wellbeing retreat from my garden.

My working life began in the beauty industry as a hairdresser, before I moved into finance and insurance. In 2021, everything changed when I was diagnosed with breast cancer. After successful treatment, I was given the opportunity to pause, reflect, and re-evaluate what truly mattered to me. I knew then that I wanted to do something more meaningful, something that helped people.

I discovered Tropic Skincare completely by accident, and it became a turning point in my life. I fell in love with the incredible results, but even more so with the ethics behind the brand: green, cruelty-free, and made without harsh chemicals. After seeing such positive changes in my own skin, I became a Tropic Ambassador, a role I’m deeply passionate about.

My journey didn’t stop there. Wanting to extend my offering and care for others in a deeper way, I trained in facials and Indian head massage, took a leap of faith, left my job, and opened my own treatment room, The Retreat. Tucked away in the corner of my garden, surrounded by trees and wildlife, it is a calm, private, and nurturing space designed for you to truly switch off.

I specialise in customer-focused, results-driven facials, where we take time to chat, understand your skin, your lifestyle, and your concerns, so every treatment is completely tailored to you. My aim is for every client to leave feeling relaxed, cared for, and confident in their skin.

Alongside my business, I’m also a proud volunteer with Breast Cancer Now, supporting women who are currently facing diagnosis and treatment. It’s a cause that will always be close to my heart.

Everything I do is rooted in care, connection, and integrity. Whether you visit me for skincare, relaxation, or support, my goal is simple: to offer you a safe space to rest, reset, and feel truly looked after.
about.closing_line: If you are not sure what you need yet, just message me. I will help you choose what feels right for you.

strands.title: One vision — three signature offerings

cards.title: Pure Glow Facials
cards.copy: Prescriptive, results-driven facials tailored to your skin on the day. Each treatment begins with a conversation about your skin and what you want from the experience, followed by carefully chosen products and techniques to suit your needs. Calm, nurturing, and never routine.

cards.title: Pure Glow Corporate
cards.copy: Wellbeing sessions for workplaces, offering moments of calm and care during busy or high-pressure periods. Ideal for events, seasonal peaks, or supporting teams in a more personal, human way.

cards.title: Pure Glow PT
cards.subtitle: Coming in 2026
cards.copy: Strength- and confidence-focused personal training for women, with particular support around midlife and menopause. Sessions are gentle, supportive, and tailored to the individual. Details coming soon.

strands.note: Care sits at the heart of everything I offer at Pure Glow — calm, considered treatments that support how you feel, not just how you look.

treatments.title: Treatments
treatments.intro: No two faces — or weeks — are the same. Every treatment is adapted to you on the day.
treatments.treatment_1_desc:
A deeply indulgent, fully bespoke facial using Tropic Skincare — award-winning, natural, vegan and results-driven products selected to address your skin’s unique needs.

Your experience begins with a gentle surface cleanse followed by a thorough deep cleanse to refine and refresh the skin. Soft steam and expert exfoliation encourage cell renewal and boost radiance, before a soothing arm, shoulder and neck massage melts away tension while enhancing circulation and promoting relaxation.

A carefully chosen treatment is then applied, followed by a tailored serum, moisturiser and nourishing facial oil to leave your complexion balanced, hydrated and glowing.

Perfect if you’re looking for visible results paired with a truly luxurious, restorative experience.
treatments.treatment_2_desc:
A results-driven facial tailored to your skin’s individual needs. This express treatment begins with a gentle surface cleanse, followed by a deep cleanse to refresh and purify the skin.

You’ll enjoy your choice of either a targeted treatment or a mini arm, neck and face massage, before the facial is completed with serum, moisturiser and nourishing facial oil.

Ideal if you’re short on time but still want an effective skin boost.
treatments.treatment_3_desc:
A deeply relaxing and restorative treatment focusing on the upper back, shoulders, neck, scalp and face to release built-up tension and promote a sense of calm and wellbeing.

Using rhythmic massage techniques, this treatment can help ease tight muscles, relieve stress, reduce headaches and improve circulation.

Ideal if you carry tension in your shoulders and neck, experience mental fatigue, or simply want to switch off and relax.
treatments.treatment_4_desc:
A restorative facial designed to relieve stress, support nervous system regulation and release tension held in the face and jaw.

This deeply calming treatment combines gentle lymphatic drainage, facial sculpting and intraoral (buccal) massage to ease physical and emotional tension often associated with high workloads, screen use and chronic stress.

By working with the lymphatic and nervous systems, this facial helps reduce facial tightness, jaw clenching and mental fatigue, leaving the client feeling grounded, refreshed and visibly relaxed.
treatment_4_benefits: Relieves jaw tension and stress-related holding
Supports lymphatic flow and natural detoxification
Reduces facial fatigue from screen use and posture
Promotes deep relaxation, clarity and wellbeing

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.intro:
I don’t use online booking at the moment, as I like to keep appointments flexible and tailored to each person.

The easiest way to start is to send me a message with:
instructions: what you’re interested in (facial / head massage / not sure yet)
contact.outro:
Before confirming an appointment, I’ll ask a few simple questions about your health and any current medications. This is just to make sure treatments are safe and suitable for you.

If anything needs checking with a GP, I’ll guide you through that gently and clearly before your visit.
contact.reassurance: Your wellbeing always comes first, and nothing is booked unless it’s right for you.

testimonials.title: What clients say
testimonials.review_1_text: I had the pleasure of relaxing in Caroline’s warm and cosy beauty room for my facial. After talking through what would happen, I just laid back and felt the stress I didn’t even realise I was holding melt away. I left feeling relaxed, refreshed and re-energised.
testimonials.review_2_text: I had a facial with Caz a few days ago and it was amazing. She explained what each product would do at every stage, and the treatment felt luxurious but purposeful. I left with glowing skin and I’ll definitely be back.
testimonials.review_3_text: I’ve had many facials over the years, but this is probably the best. Caz’s treatment room feels like a secret hideaway and the whole experience was incredibly relaxing and professional.

reviews_page.author: Gaynor
reviews_page.text: I had the pleasure of relaxing in Caroline’s warm and cosy beauty room for my facial. After explaining what would happen, agreeing what I wanted from it and which products would be used, I just laid back and felt the stress I didn’t even realise I was holding leave me. I could honestly have stayed there all day. I came out feeling relaxed, refreshed and re-energised. I would definitely recommend going to see Caroline.

reviews_page.author: Catherine
reviews_page.text:
I had a facial with Caz a few days ago and it was amazing. I was so relaxed from the minute I entered the cabin with its lovely setting. It’s winter now, but I can imagine how gorgeous it will be in summer.

Caz used a range of products and explained what each one would do to my skin at every stage. The treatment felt very luxurious, but also like it was genuinely nourishing my skin. The pressure was just right and I left with glowing skin. I’ll definitely be back soon. Thank you.

reviews_page.author: Jenni
reviews_page.text: I had an amazing facial and shoulder massage with Caz. Her technique is very relaxing and professional. I’ve had many facials over the years, but this is probably the best. Her treatment room feels like a secret hideaway and is incredibly tranquil. I’m really looking forward to my next visit.

reviews_page.author: Jo
reviews_page.text: Caroline is absolutely fantastic. She is extremely knowledgeable about skincare, makeup and the products she uses. I had a wonderful facial which was so relaxing, and my skin felt amazing afterwards. I would recommend Caroline to anyone looking for high-quality skincare, guidance, advice and support.
